content: this cute slouchy tam was designed with the cowgirl cowl by pam powers 1 in mind my sisted wanted a hat that matched worked from the bottom up with a lace brim followed by a slouchy stockinette body the tam shows off handiwork and nice yarn all at once it is topped off with a tassel for extra sass pattern calls for a skein of malabrigo yarn rios but i was using leftovers from the cowl and used probably 3/4 of a skein any worsted weight yarn will do to make the tam larger or smaller add or subtract in sets of 10 and add or subtract **3 not 2 ** accordingly from the number of k stitches before k2tog in hat decreases this will obviously use more or less yarn than is called for 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cowgirl-cowl
